name: Don't Be Sad
description:
WARNING

This game depicts depressive and intrusive thoughts. It's not appropriate if you're strugglin with your mental health. You can play other things instead like Coffe Talk, Slocial Interactive Trainer, Regular Human Basketball, or Planetarium. Please, take care of yourself. You're worth it.

Now you have the power to not be sad. Use it carefully. 

Assets from the game from:

  • Art Assets - 1-Bit Pack by Kenney
  • Dialog Voices - animalese.js
  • Shotguns Sound - Doom (1993)
